titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on Primid XL-552.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: 6/7/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on Primid XL-552.
